languages.text: "Если подключить когитатор к системе аугментации, лексмеханик сможет послужить проводником для передачи данных. Хотя бы частично, но мы узнаем детали, которые он видел и слышал, а теперь не в состоянии припомнить".

traits.locale_text: "Если подключить когитатор к системе аугментации, лексмеханик сможет послужить проводником для передачи данных. Хотя бы частично, но мы узнаем то, что он видел и слышал".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."
languages.original_text: "Если подключить когитатор к системе аугментации, лексмеханик сможет послужить проводником для передачи данных. Хотя бы частично, но мы узнаем детали, которые он видел и слышал, а теперь не в состоянии припомнить".

traits.locale_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果我们把那台沉思者连接到思律机僧的植入系统上，就可以把他变成传输数据的渠道，从而了解那些他曾看到过、听到过，但现在无法回忆起来的细节。即便是不完整的细节，也会有帮助。”
languages.original_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们把那台思考器连接到法律技工的植入系统上，就可以把他变成传输数据的渠道，从而了解那些他曾看到过、听到过，但现在无法回忆起来的细节。即便是不完整的细节，也会有帮助。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Si conectamos el cogitador al sistema aumético, el lexmecánico será el conducto que transmitirá los datos. Descubriremos todos los detalles, aun incompletos, de todo lo que ha visto y oído pero es incapaz de recordar».
languages.original_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."

traits.locale_text: «Si conectamos el cogitador al sistema aumético, el lexmecánico será el conducto que transmitirá los datos. Descubriremos todos los detalles, aun incompletos, de todo lo que ha visto y oído pero es incapaz de recordar».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「考算機をオーグメティック・システムに接続すれば、法技術者がデータを送信するパイプ役になる。法技術者が見たり聞いたりしたものの、今は思い出すことができないことの詳細を、不完全であっても知ることができるはずです」
languages.original_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."

traits.locale_text: 「考算機をオーグメティック・システムに接続すれば、法技術者がデータを送信するパイプ役になる。法技術者が見たり聞いたりしたものの、今は思い出すことができないことの詳細を、不完全であっても知ることができるはずです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn wir den Cogitator mit dem augmetischen System verbinden, dient der Lexmechanicus als Leitung zur Übermittlung der Daten. Wir erfahren – wenn auch unvollständig –, was er gesehen und gehört hat, auch wenn er sich nicht daran erinnern kann."
languages.original_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir den Cogitator mit dem augmetischen System verbinden, dient der Lexmechanicus als Leitung zur Übermittlung der Daten. Wir erfahren – wenn auch unvollständig –, was er gesehen und gehört hat, auch wenn er sich nicht daran erinnern kann."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si nous connectons le cogitateur au système augmétique, le lexmécanicien servira d'intermédiaire pour la transmission de données. Nous pourrons ainsi connaître les détails, même incomplets, des choses qu'il a vues et entendues, mais dont il ne peut plus se souvenir. »
languages.original_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."

traits.locale_text: « Si nous connectons le cogitateur au système augmétique, le lexmécanicien servira d'intermédiaire pour la transmission de données. Nous pourrons ainsi connaître les détails, même incomplets, des choses qu'il a vues et entendues, mais dont il ne peut plus se souvenir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kavramsayarı ogmetik sistemine bağlarsak Lexmekanik, veri iletimi için aracı görevi görecektir. Görüp duyduğu fakat anımsayamadığı ayrıntıları, tümüyle olmasa da öğrenebileceğiz."
languages.original_text: "If we connect the cogitator to the augmetics system, the Lexmechanic will serve as a conduit for transmitting the data. We will learn the details, even if they are incomplete, of the things he saw and heard but is now unable to recall."

traits.locale_text: "Kavramsayarı ogmetik sistemine bağlarsak Lexmekanik, veri iletimi için aracı görevi görecektir. Görüp duyduğu fakat anımsayamadığı ayrıntıları, tümüyle olmasa da öğrenebileceğiz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
